Options

zposition (string)

The "z-position" of the menu.

Possible values: "back", "front" or "next".

Default value: "back".


Code example:

$("#my-menu").mmenu({
   zposition: "next"
});

Note: This option requires the mmenu-positioning.css file to be included in your webpage.
